title: Personal Safety - Threat and Danger Response
description: Critical communication and actions when facing safety threats during gig work

emergencyPhrases.spanish: Voy a llamar a la policía
emergencyPhrases.pronunciation: voy ah yah-MAR ah lah poh-lee-SEE-ah

emergencyPhrases.english: Get out of the car now
I need help, I'm in danger

intoxicatedAggressive.scenario: Intoxicated passenger becomes aggressive or threatening
immediateAction: Pull over in well-lit public area
Tell passenger to exit: 'Salga del carro ahora'
If they refuse, exit vehicle yourself and call 911
spanishPhrases: El viaje ha terminado. Necesita salir ahora. (The trip is over. You need to exit now.)
Voy a llamar a la policía si no sale. (I will call police if you don't exit.)

weaponThreat.scenario: Passenger displays or threatens with weapon
immediateAction: Stay calm. Your life is more valuable than money or car
Look for opportunity to safely exit or escape
Remember: people before things, life before money
Note: description, direction traveled, any details
spanishPhrases: Está bien, está bien, tome lo que quiera. (Okay, okay, take whatever you want.)
No voy a resistir. (I won't resist.)
weaponThreat.afterSafety: Call 911, then platform. Do not pursue. You are witness, not enforcer

suspiciousRequest.scenario: Passenger asks you to go to isolated area or makes uncomfortable request
spanishPhrases: No me siento cómodo con esa ubicación. (I'm not comfortable with that location.)
Solo puedo ir a direcciones que estén en la aplicación. (I can only go to addresses that are in the app.)

immediateAction: Drive to police station or fire station
Make multiple right turns to confirm following
spanishPhrases: Estoy siendo seguido, necesito ayuda policial. (I'm being followed, I need police help.)

actions: Trust your gut - cancel ride if you feel unsafe before pickup
Keep doors locked until identity confirmed
Work during daylight in unfamiliar areas when possible
Priority 3: Call for help when safe
Comply with immediate demands if weapon involved
Look for witnesses, cameras, public areas
Mental note of details for police report
File police report - get case number

uber.emergencyButton: In-app 911 button shares location with dispatcher
uber.shareTrip: Share ETA and route with trusted contacts
uber.rideCheck: App detects unusual stops and checks on you
uber.anonymizedPhone: App masks your real phone number

culturalNotes.note: Your safety is more important than ratings. Cancel or end ride if you feel unsafe
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: You have more authority to refuse than traditional Colombian service roles

culturalNotes.note: Police take threats against workers seriously. Always report incidents
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More reliable emergency response than in many Colombian areas

culturalNotes.note: US culture does not expect you to fight or chase. Escape and report is correct response
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Different from Colombian machismo culture - safety over pride

culturalNotes.note: You have legal protection as worker. Platforms must support your safety decisions
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Stronger legal framework than Colombian informal economy
